description: Walls and towers surrounding the ancient city of Alyzeia in Acarnania. Significant reference was made to the plan in Murray 1982 (page 107, figure 107) in mapping these components; however, only those locations that are visible in more recent Google Earth imagery (especially that dating to April 2017 and May 2020) are included here.

properties.description: Atop which now stands a "small white chapel of Panagia" per Murray.
